Name: Ricky did nothing wrong
About the game: Synopsis In this Point & Click game you'll play as a father in search of his beloved son. You will have to face little challenges and big choices to find him and bring him back to the safety of home. Description In this Point & Click graphic adventure, you'll need to solve puzzles and decide the actions that Ricky must follow.
